Our classes

Looking for a theatre class where everyone feels like they belong? At Journey, our classes are designed with you in mind, no matter your age or previous experience. Forget any notions of needing to be a seasoned performer â€“ we're all about getting stuck in, having a good laugh, and discovering the joy of theatre together.

Our inclusive approach means that everyone has a voice and a chance to shine. We create a supportive and playful environment where you can feel comfortable exploring your creativity at your own pace. Expect lots of fun games, collaborative activities, and opportunities to let your imagination run wild.

Whether you're a complete beginner or have some theatrical experience under your belt, our classes offer a welcoming space to learn new skills, build confidence, and connect with others in the community. We believe that theatre should be accessible and enjoyable for everyone, and our classes reflect that philosophy. So, come along, embrace the fun, and let's create some theatrical magic together! There's no pressure, just plenty of laughter and opportunities to discover your inner performer.

Choose your Group

Kids Class

Unleash your child's imagination in our exciting and playful drama classes! Through fun games, storytelling, and creative activities, kids will discover their inner performer, build confidence, and make new friends. It's a fantastic way for them to express themselves, develop teamwork skills, and have a blast in a supportive and encouraging environment. Let the adventures begin!

  • Wednesday - 5pm
    Friday - 5pm
    Saturday - 10am

Teen Class

Ready to step into the spotlight? Our teen drama classes offer a dynamic and supportive space to explore your creativity, develop your acting skills, and connect with fellow enthusiasts. Dive into improvisation, scene work, and character development in a fun and engaging atmosphere. Whether you're looking to build confidence, hone your performance abilities, or simply try something new, our classes provide a platform to express yourself and discover the power of theatre. Let's bring your stories to life!

  • Wednesday - 7pm
    Friday - 7pm
    Saturday - 1pm

Adult Class

It's never too late to explore your creative side! Our adult drama classes offer a welcoming and engaging environment for individuals of all experience levels. Whether you're looking to unleash your inner actor, boost your confidence, or simply have some fun and meet new people, our classes provide a space to learn new skills, explore different characters, and participate in exciting theatrical exercises. Come and discover the joy of stepping onto the stage in a relaxed and supportive setting. Let's create some memorable moments together!

  • Monday - 7pm
    Thursday - 7pm
    Sunday - 10am
